narrative:
No-non complaint items noted this inspection.  
Applicant wants to be licensed as a class C Exhibitor.
Please issue a class C license.
License fee will be sent by the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, ERO
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27605
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
Inspection and Exit conducted with applicant and facility representative.
